text: Random conversation. Next week I will having a discussion on my team where I hope to push for the case of Julia. However, with Modern Fortran gaining momentum, how does one justify and argue for Julia? What advantage does using Julia above Fortran (as Fortran is ditching old school) offer? I understand the REPL ability and all (I think somewhere there is a post of Good O'l Fortran is even having a REPL soon), but I'd like to some the community response here. Thanks.
